title: manasu karagudEmi
sahitya:
manasu karagudEmi shrI mAnini manOhara nI


anupallavi

  vanaja bhavAdi vinuta gIrvANAdula brOcina nI


caraNam    aramara lETiki nI kula birudulu dalaci jUDumu sharaNamanina Degakai tana sharIramunu kOshiccina
karuNAkaruDagu shibhi bhuvaruDu nIdhu tAta gadA maracitivO EmO shrI varada venkaTEshvara nI
